titleStmt.title: Some considerations of present use wherein is shewn that the strong ought to bear with the weak, and the weak not clamour against or censure the strong, in which the true notion of the strong and weak is stated / delivered in a farewell-sermon at St. George Buttolph-Lane, London, by Benjamin Hoffman ...
titleStmt.author: Hoffman, Benjamin.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
